```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
library("edjnetquotefinder")
```

```{r time}
Sys.time()
```


```{r token}
twitter_token <- readRDS(file = "twitter_token.rds")
```


```{r gettweets}
qf_get_tweets_from_list(slug = "meps-2019-2024",
                        owner_user = "EuroParlPress",
                        n = 3200,
                        include_rts = FALSE,
                        twitter_token = twitter_token)
```


```{r}
all_members <- rtweet::lists_members(1138737420671885312, token = twitter_token)
```


```{r}
qf_get_tweets_by_user(users = all_members$user_id, n = 3200, wait = 300, twitter_token = twitter_token)
```
